# Resource `hiveio_user`

Add a ldap user or group with admin or readonly access.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **realm** (String)
- **role** (String) readonly or admin

### Optional

- **groupname** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **username** (String)
